subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family ruled over Udaipur?
question_hi: उदयपुर के रस्ते के संत क्या थे?
explanation_en: The ruling royal family of Udaipur was the Mewar Dynasty.

explanation_en: The correct answer to this question is B as Udaipur was ruled by the Maharaja Fateh Singh II, who belonged to the Bhati Rajput clan.
